caption: it is the chair by itself not near the desk
select the sink farther from the washer
this cabinet is dark and farther away from the door
the box shelf you want is right next to the chair in the corner with the pillow it is almost touching the chair
program:
BOX0=LOC(object='box shelf')
BOX1=LOC(object='chair')
BOX2=LOC(object='corner')
BOX3=LOC(object='pillow')
TARGET=CLOSEST(targets=BOX0, anchors=BOX1)
TARGET=CLOSEST(targets=BOX0, anchors=BOX3)

TARGET=FARTHEST(targets=BOX0, anchors=[BOX1, BOX2])

caption: choose the monitor that is closest to the windows
the window farthest from the door
it is the left armchair between the two closest to the table
the white monitor farthest from the trash cans which are in between the two doors

BOX0=LOC(object='monitor')
BOX1=LOC(object='trash cans')
BOX2=LOC(object='doors')
TARGET=FARTHEST(targets=BOX0, anchors=BOX1)
TARGET=BETWEEN(targets=BOX0, anchors=BOX2)

caption: the longer rail farthest from sink
the shoes farthest from the front door
standing at the foot of the bed looking at the head of the bed it is the pillow on the left
when facing the long grey counter it is the window in the middle
the sink is to the right of the metal thing on the wall and on the right of the sink on the wall is so meting white and elongated also to the right of the sink are plastic containers
from the foot of the bed choose the dresser that is to your right it is the shorter dresser with eight drawers
program:
BOX0=LOC(object='dresser')
BOX1=LOC(object='bed')
BOX2=RIGHT(targets=BOX0, anchors=BOX1)
SIZES=CALC_SIZE(targets=BOX2)
TARGET=MIN(data=SIZES)

caption: the top cabinet next to door
the tall narrow window next to the exit door
the blue trash can to the left of the grey trash can
program:
BOX0=LOC(object='blue trash can')
BOX1=LOC(object='grey trash can')
TARGET=LEFT(targets=BOX0, anchors=BOX1)

caption: the trash can located next to the two doors leading out
the blue bag on top of the end table next to the couch
program:
BOX0=LOC(object='blue bag')
BOX1=LOC(object='end table')
BOX2=LOC(object='couch')
TARGET=HIGHER(targets=BOX0, anchors=[BOX1, BOX2])

caption: it is the box on top
the trash can in front of piles of papers that are under a desk
it is the small bookshelf located between the two larger bookshelves
if you are facing the monitors select the mouse that goes with the computer on the left
program:
BOX0=LOC(object='monitors')
BOX1=LOC(object='mouse')
BOX2=LOC(object='computer')
TARGET=LEFT(targets=BOX0, anchors=BOX2)
TARGET=WITH(targets=TARGET, data=BOX1)

caption: of the two chairs that are next to each other choose the one in front of the monitor
facing the windows the window to the left
it is the chair with the towel hanging behind it
the light in the middle of the room on the ceiling
the window in the back of the room ( assuming the blackboard is the front ) directly across the room from the board
select the curtain beside the chairs the one on your left
